content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, The Adventures Of Sam Spade starts us off with his case from November 9, 1947, The Bow Window Caper.

(29:47) Box 13 closes the show with Damsel In Distress, his story from November 14, 1948.

Download CaseClosed766
